author: Bloomberg.com
title: Baidu's IQiyi Unit to Offer Lions Gate Films Online in China
text:
Lions Gate Entertainment Corp., the studio that produced “The Hunger Games,” reached an agreement with Baidu Inc.’s iQiyi Internet and mobile video company to offer movies online in China through a subscription service and video on demand.
IQiyi will have an exclusive window for Lions Gate theatrical titles covered under the agreement, according to a statement Friday from the companies.
The accord gives Lions Gate, the film and TV studio run from Santa Monica, California, access to a potential audience of 500 million, according to the statement. The films include the coming November release “The Hunger Games: Mockingjay 2,” “Allegiant,” and “Sicario,” which is in theaters now, the statement said.
